description: This file defines architecture-specific build configurations and tuning parameters for the ARM Cortex-A57 processor within a Yocto/OpenEmbedded project. It sets variables, includes other config files, and defines features and packages tailored for this CPU.

methods.name: bb.utils.contains
methods.description: A utility method used to check if a string contains a particular substring, used here to conditionally append compiler arguments based on features.
